// åŸºäºæ•°ç»„å®ç°çš„é¡ºåºæ ˆ
public class ArrayStack {

  public ArrayStack(int n) {

    items[count] = item;

public class StackOfArray<Item> implements Iterable<Item>{
//å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®çš„æ•°ç»„
Item[] a = (Item[])new Object[1];
//è®°å½•å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°N
int N = 0;
//æ„é€ å™¨
public StackOfArray(){}
//æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ 
public void push(Item item){
//è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰©å®¹
if (N == a.length ) resize(2*a.length );
a[N++] = item;
}
//åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ 
public Item pop(){
Item item = a[--N];
a[N] = null;
if (N > 0 && N == a.length / 4) resize(a.length / 2);
return item;
}
//æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
public boolean isEmpty(){
return N == 0;
}
//å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°
public int size(){
return N;
}
//æ”¹å˜æ•°ç»„å®¹é‡
private void resize(int length) {
Item[] temp = (Item[])new Object[length];
for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
temp[i] = a[i];
}
a = temp;
}
//è¿”å›æ ˆä¸­æœ€è¿‘æ·»åŠ çš„å…ƒç´ è€Œä¸åˆ é™¤å®ƒ
public Item peek(){
return a[N-1];
}
@Override
public Iterator<Item> iterator() {
return new ArrayIterator();
}
//å†…éƒ¨ç±»
class ArrayIterator implements Iterator{
//æ§åˆ¶è¿­ä»£æ•°é‡
int i = N;
@Override
public boolean hasNext() {
return i > 0;
}
@Override
public Item next() {
return a[--i];
}
}
}

å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼šï¼ˆæ ˆçš„é“¾è¡¨å®ç°ï¼‰
public class StackOfLinked<Item> implements Iterable<Item> {
//å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç±»å‹å‚æ•°
private class Node{
Item item;
Node next;
}
private Node first;
private int N;
//æ„é€ å™¨
public StackOfLinked(){}
//æ·»åŠ 
public void push(Item item){
Node oldfirst = first;
first = new Node();
first.item = item;
first.next = oldfirst;
N++;
}
//åˆ é™¤
public Item pop(){
Item item = first.item;
first = first.next;
N--;
return item;
}
//æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
public boolean isEmpty(){
return N == 0;
}
//å…ƒç´ æ•°é‡
public int size(){
return N;
}
//è¿”å›æ ˆä¸­æœ€è¿‘æ·»åŠ çš„å…ƒç´ è€Œä¸åˆ é™¤å®ƒ
public Item peek(){
return first.item;
}
@Override
public Iterator<Item> iterator() {
return new LinkedIterator();
}
//å†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼šè¿­ä»£å™¨
class LinkedIterator implements Iterator{
int i = N;
Node t = first;
@Override
public boolean hasNext() {
return i > 0;
}
@Override
public Item next() {
Item item = (Item) t.item;
t = t.next;
i--;
return item;
}
}
}

class Stack:
"""
ç”¨Pythonåˆ—è¡¨å®ç°ï¼Œå…¶å®æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€æ‰©å®¹çš„æ ˆã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯ç”¨Javaçš„æ•°ç»„å®ç°çš„è¯ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨æ‰©å®¹æ•°ç»„ã€‚

ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯ O(1)

def __init__(self):

def push(self, ele):
# ä¸ä¼šæ²¡ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå› ä¸ºPythonçš„listä¼šåŠ¨æ€æ‰©å®¹
self._stack.append(ele)

def pop(self):
if self.is_empty():
return None
return self._stack.pop()

def top(self):
return self._stack[-1]

def min(self):
return min(self._stack)

def max(self):
return max(self._stack)

def is_empty(self):
return self._stack.__len__() == 0

def length(self):
return self._stack.__len__()

def reverse(self):
self._stack = self._stack[::-1]

def clear(self):
while not self.is_empty():
self._stack.pop()

def __repr__(self):
return str(self._stack)

def match_bracket(strings):
open_bracket = "({["
close_bracket = ")]}"
bracket_map = {'(': ')', '[': ']', '{': '}'}
label = True
stack = Stack()
if strings == "":
return True
for char in strings:
if char not in (open_bracket + close_bracket):
continue
if char in open_bracket:
stack.push(char)
print(stack)
continue
if char in close_bracket:
if stack.is_empty():
label = False
break
if bracket_map[stack.pop()] == char:
continue
else:
label = False
break
if not stack.is_empty():
label = False
print(stack)
return label

package main

import "fmt"

type Node struct {
Data string
Next *Node
}

type LinkedList struct {
headNode *Node
length int
count int
}

// å‡ºæ ˆæ“ä½œ
func (l *LinkedList) NewStack(length int) *LinkedList {
return &LinkedList{length: length}
}

// å…¥æ ˆæ“ä½œ
func (l *LinkedList) Push(data string) bool {
item := &Node{Data: data}
if l.count == l.length {
return false
}
item.Next = l.headNode
l.headNode = item
l.count++
return true
}

// å‡ºæ ˆæ“ä½œ
func (l *LinkedList) Pop() string {
if l.count == 0 {
return ""
}
res := l.headNode.Data
l.headNode = l.headNode.Next
return res
}

// æ‹¬å·åŒ¹é…
public boolean isValid(String s) {
if (s == null || s.length() == 0) {
return true;
}
Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();
for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {
// æ ˆæ˜¯ç©ºçš„ï¼Œå…¥æ ˆ
if (stack.empty()) {
stack.add(c);
} else {
Character pop = stack.peek();
switch (pop) {
case '(':
if (')' == c) {
stack.pop();
} else {
stack.add(c);
}
break;
case '{':
if ('}' == c) {
stack.pop();
} else {
stack.add(c);
}
break;
case '[':
if (']' == c) {
stack.pop();
} else {
stack.add(c);
}
break;
default:
return false;
}
}
}
return stack.empty();
}

class Browser:
def __init__(self):

def open(self, url):

print(f"Open new url: {url}")
self.forward_stack.clear() # æ¸…ç©ºå‰è¿›æ ˆ

def back(self):
if not self.backward_stack.is_empty():
top = self.backward_stack.pop() # ä»åé€€æ ˆä¸­å¼¹å‡º
self.forward_stack.push(top)
print(f"Back to {top}")
else:
print("Cannot backward")

def forward(self):
if not self.forward_stack.is_empty():
top = self.forward_stack.pop() # ä»å‰è¿›æ ˆä¸­å¼¹å‡º
self.backward_stack.push(top)

public class ArrayStacks {

private int[] items;

private int n;

private int count;

public ArrayStacks(int n) {
this.items = new int[n];
this.n = n;
this.count = 0;
}

public void push(int item) {
if (count == n) {
//ç›¸ç­‰2å€çš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæ‰©å®¹
n = n * 2;
int[] temps = new int[n];
for (int i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
temps[i] = items[i];
}
//æ¸…ç©ºåŸæ•°ç»„
items = null;
//æ‰©å®¹åŸitemsæ•°ç»„
items = new int[n];
//é‡æ–°èµ‹å€¼
items = temps;
}
items[count] = item;
++count;
}

public int pop() {
if (count == 0) {
return -1;
}
int tem = items[count - 1];
--count;
return tem;
}
}

class ArrayStack {

constructor(n){

this.items = new Array(n);
this.n = n;
this.count = 0;
}


pop(){

if (this.count>0){
this.count--;
return this.items[this.count];
} else {
return null;
}


}


peek(){

if (this.count>0){
return this.items[this.count-1];
} else {
return null;
}
}

push(item){

if (this.count < this.n){
this.items[this.count] = item;
this.count ++;
this.print();
return true;
} else {
console.log('æ ˆæ»¡');
return false;
}

}


isEmpty(){
return this.count == 0 ?true:false;
}

print(){
let string='';
for(let i=this.count-1;i>=0;i--){
string+=this.items[i]+'--';
}
console.log(string);
}


}

struct stack {
int* items;
int count;
int n;
}

void initStack(struct stack* istack, int n)
{
istack->items = malloc(sizeof(int)*n);
istack->n = n;
istack->count = 0;
}

int stackPop(struct stack* istack)
{
if(count == 0){
return -1;
} else {
return istack->items[--(istack->count)];
}
}

bool stackPush(struct stack* istack, int item)
{
if(istack->count == n) return false;
istack->items[(istack->count)++] = item;
return true;
}

/// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨Arrayå®ç°çš„æ ˆ
public struct ArrayStack<T> {

/// ä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„æ¥å­˜å‚¨æ ˆé‡Œé¢çš„å…ƒç´ 
private var elements: [T]

/// åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼ˆæ„é€ å™¨ï¼‰
public init() {
self.elements = []
}

/// å‡ºæ ˆ
/// - Returns: è¿”å›å‡ºæ ˆçš„å…ƒç´ 
public mutating func pop() -> T? {
return self.elements.popLast()
}

/// å‹æ ˆ
/// - Parameter element: å°†elementå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­
public mutating func push(_ element: T) {
self.elements.append(element)
}

/// è·å–æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¸å‡ºæ ˆï¼‰
/// - Returns: æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ 
public mutating func peek() -> T? {
return self.elements.last
}

/// åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
/// - Returns: æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
public mutating func isEmpty() -> Bool {
return self.elements.isEmpty
}

/// è·å–å½“å‰æ ˆä¸­å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°
public var count : Int {
return self.elements.count
}
}

class Solution {
public:
bool isValid(string s) {
stack<char> st;
for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
if(s[i]=='('||s[i]=='['||s[i]=='{'){
st.push(s[i]);
}
else if(!st.empty()){
char c = st.top();st.pop();
if(s[i]==']' && c!='[')return false;
if(s[i]==')' && c!='(') return false;
if(s[i]=='}' && c!='{') return false;
}
else return false;
}
return st.empty();
}
};

<pre>
public class StackBrace {
static Map<String, String> configMapping = new HashMap<>();

public static void main(String[] args) {
configMapping.put("}", "{");
configMapping.put(")", "(");
configMapping.put("]", "[");
String s = "{[()]{}}[]";
System.out.println(isValid(s));
}

private static boolean isValid(String s){
if (null == s || s.length()<2){
return false;
}
String[] ss = s.split("");
Stack<String> tmp = new Stack<>();
for (int i = 0; i<ss.length; i++){
if (ss[i].equals("{") || ss[i].equals("(") || ss[i].equals("[")){
tmp.push(ss[i]);
}else {
String top = tmp.peek();
if (top.equals(configMapping.get(ss[i]))){
tmp.pop();
}
}
}
return tmp.isEmpty();
}
}

public class LinkedStack {
static class ListNode {
ListNode next;
int val;

public ListNode(int val) {
this.val = val;
}
}

static ListNode head = null;
static int removeIndex = 0;

public static void main(String[] args) {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
System.out.println("push:" + i);
push(head, i);
}
pop(head);
pop(head);
pop(head);
pop(head);
print(head);
}

public static void push(ListNode node, int val) {
ListNode newNode = new ListNode(val);
if (node == null) {
node = newNode;
} else if (node.next == null) {
removeIndex++;
node.next = newNode;
} else {
push(node.next, val);
}
head = node;
}

//æŠŠå‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„nextè®¾ç½®ä¸ºNULL
public static void pop(ListNode head) {
for (int i = 1; i < removeIndex; i++) {
head = head.next;
}
head.next = null;
removeIndex--;
}

public static void print(ListNode node) {
System.out.print("-->" + node.val);
if (node.next != null) {
print(node.next);
}
}
}

public class ArrayStack {
static int size = 5;
static String[] arr = new String[size];
static int count = 0;

public static void main(String[] args) {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
push(i + "");
}
pop();
pop();
pop();
pop();
System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));
}

static void push(String value) {
if (count == size) {
//æ‰©å®¹+å¤åˆ¶ï¼Œarr=æ–°æ•°ç»„
String[] newArr = new String[size * 2];
System.arraycopy(arr, 0, newArr, 0, size);
arr = newArr;
size *= 2;
}
arr[count] = value;
count++;

}

static void pop() {
if (count > 0) {
arr[count - 1] = null;
count--;
} else {
System.out.println("æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ ä¸ºç©º!" );
}
}
}

class Node {
constructor(value) {
this.value = value;
this.next = null;
}
}

class Stack {
constructor(maxLength) {
this._length = 0;
this._head = null;
this._maxLength = maxLength;
}

push(item) {
if (this._length >= this._maxLength) {
console.warn("stack overflow maxlength");
}
const node = new Node(item);
const tempHead = this._head;
node.next = tempHead;
this._head = node;
this._length++;
}

pop() {
this._head = this._head.next;
this._length--;
}
}

public class StackOnLinkedList {

private Node top = null;

public void push(Node node) {
node.next = top;
top = node;
}

public Node pop() {
if (top != null) {
Node re = top;
top = top.next;
return re;
}
return null;
}

public Node getTop() {
return top;
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
StackOnLinkedList stack = new StackOnLinkedList();
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
stack.push(new Node(i + ""));
}

while (stack.getTop() != null) {
System.out.println(stack.pop().getValue());
}
}


static class Node {
private String value;


private Node next;

public Node(String value) {
this.value = value;
}

public String getValue() {
return value;
}
}
}

public class LinkeStack {
private Node node;

@Data
private static class Node {
private Object data;
private Node next;
}

public LinkeStack2() {
node = new Node();
}

public boolean push(Object o) {
Node data = new Node();
data.setData(o);
data.setNext(node);
node = data;
return true;
}

public Object pop() {
if (node == null) {
return null;
}
Object data = node.getData();
node = node.getNext();
return data;
}
}

export const calc = s => {
const evaluate = {
"+": (a, b) => a + b,
"-": (a, b) => a - b,
"*": (a, b) => a * b,
"/": (a, b) => a / b
};
let isPop = false;
const stack1 = [];
const stack2 = [];
let sum = 0;
for (const c of s) {
if (/[0-9]+/.test(c)) {
stack1.push(+c);
if (isPop) {
const a = stack1.pop();
const b = stack1.pop();
const sign = stack2.pop();
stack1.push(evaluate[sign](b, a));
isPop = false;
}
} else if ("+-".indexOf(c) > -1) {
stack2.push(c);
} else if ("*/".indexOf(c) > -1) {
stack2.push(c);
isPop = true;
}
}
while (stack1.length > 0) {
const a = stack1.shift();
const b = stack1.shift();
const sign = stack2.shift();
if (sign) {
sum = evaluate[sign](a, b);
stack1.unshift(sum);
}
}
return sum;
}

public class ArrayStack {
private int n = 0;
private String[] items;
private int top = 0;
public ArrayStack(int capacity) {
items = new String[capacity];
n = capacity;
}

public String pop() {
if (n==0) return null;
// æ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€ç¼©å®¹,å½“å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°å°äºn/4çš„å®¹é‡æ—¶ï¼Œå®¹é‡å‡åŠ
if(top < n/4) {
String[] newItems = new String[n/2];
for (int i = 0; i < top; i++) {
newItems[i] = items[i];
items = newItems;
}
}
return items[--top];
}
public boolean push(String item) {
//æ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€æ‰©å®¹
if (top == n) {
String[] newItems = new String[2 * n];
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
newItems[i] = items[i];
}
items = newItems;
};
items[top++] = item;
return true;
}
}

public class ListNodeStack {
private ListNode popNode = null;

public boolean push(int item){
ListNode temp = popNode;
popNode = new ListNode(item);
popNode.next=temp;
return true;
}
public int pop(){
if(popNode == null){
return 0;
}
int result = popNode.val;
popNode = popNode.next;
return result;
}

public int peek(){
if(popNode == null){
return 0;
}
int result = popNode.val;
return result;
}

public boolean empty() {
return popNode == null;
}
}

public static boolean check(String str) {
List<Character> brackets = Arrays.asList('(', '[', '{', ')', ']', '}');
Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>(20, true);
char[] chars = str.toCharArray();
for (char c : chars) {
int cType = brackets.indexOf(c);
// å…¶ä»–ç¬¦åˆä¸ç®¡
if (cType == -1) {
continue;
}
Character top = stack.peep();
if (top != null) {
// æ ˆé¡¶çš„æ‹¬å·ç±»å‹
int topType = brackets.indexOf(top);

if (topType < 3) {
// å·¦å³ç›¸ç­‰ï¼ŒæŠµæ¶ˆäº†
if (topType == cType - 3) {
stack.pop();
}
// å¦‚æœæ˜¯å…¶ä»–çš„å³æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯é”™äº†
else if (cType > 3) {
return false;
}
// å®ƒæ˜¯å·¦æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå…¥æ ˆ
else {
stack.push(c);
}
}
// æ ˆé¡¶æ˜¯å³æ‹¬å·ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¢«æŠµæ¶ˆæ‰è¯´æ˜é”™äº†
// ç†è®ºä¸Šæ ¹æœ¬ä¸ä¼šèµ°åˆ°è¿™ä¸€æ­¥æ¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåªæœ‰å·¦æ‹¬å·æ‰èƒ½å…¥æ ˆ
else {
return false;
}
}
// ç¬¬ä¸€å…ƒç´ å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å·¦æ‹¬å·
else if (cType < 3) {
stack.push(c);
} else {
return false;
}
}
return stack.size() == 0;

// å®šä¹‰æŸä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹
class Node {
public $val; // ä¿å­˜å€¼
public $nextNode; // ä¸‹ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å¼•ç”¨

public function __construct($val = null,$nextNode=null)
{
$this->val = $val;
$this->nextNode = $nextNode;
}
}
class Stack
{
public $head;// å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹
public $size; // é•¿åº¦

public function __construct()
{
$this->head = new Node(); // å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ç©ºèŠ‚ç‚¹
$this->size = 0;
}

// æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
public function add($index,$value) {
if($index > $this->size) {
echo "è¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´<br/>";
return false;
}
$prev = $this->head;
for($i=0;$i<$index;$i++) {
$prev = $prev->nextNode;
}
$prev->nextNode = new Node($value,$prev->nextNode);
$this->size++;
return true;
}
// æ’å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°é“¾è¡¨å¤´
public function addFirst($value) {
$this->add(0,$value);
}
// åˆ é™¤æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®èŠ‚ç‚¹
public function deleteNode($index) {
if ($index < 1) {
echo "å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å¯ä»¥åˆ é™¤<br/>";
return false;
}
if ($index > $this->size) {
echo "è¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´<br/>";
return false;
}
$prev = $this->head;
for($i=1;$i<=$index;$i++){
if($i==$index) {
$tempNode = $prev->nextNode;
$prev->nextNode = $prev->nextNode->nextNode;
unset($tempNode);
}
$prev = $prev->nextNode;
}
$this->size--;
return true;
}
public function push($value) {
$this->addFirst($value);
}

public function pop(){
if ($this->head->nextNode) {
$r = $this->head->nextNode->val;
$this->deleteNode(1);
return $r;
} else {
return false;
}
}
}

$stack = new Stack();
$stack->push(1);
$stack->push(2);
$stack->push(3);

var_dump($stack->pop());
echo "<br>";
var_dump($stack->pop());
echo "<br>";
var_dump($stack->pop());
var_dump($stack->pop());

class Solution {
public boolean isValid(String s) {
Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();
for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {
if (c == '(') {
stack.push(')');
continue;
}
if (c == '[') {
stack.push(']');
continue;
}
if (c == '{') {
stack.push('}');
continue;
}

if (stack.empty() || stack.pop() != c) {
return false;
}
}

return stack.empty();
}
}

function ArrayStack(length) {
this.container = Object.create(null, []); // åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªçº¯å‡€çš„æ•°ç»„
this.container.length = length;
this.count = 0;
}

const arr = new ArrayStack(10);

ArrayStack.prototype.push = function(ele) {
if (this.count === this.container.length) {
console.log('ç©ºé—´ä¸è¶³');
return false;
}
this.container[this.count] = ele;
this.count++;
console.log('æˆåŠŸæ·»åŠ ');
return true;
}

ArrayStack.prototype.pop = function() {
if (this.count === 0) {
console.log('æ— æ•°æ®,æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥');
return null;
}
const tmp = this.container[this.count - 1];
this.container[this.count - 1] = null;
this.count--;
return tmp;
}

class Solution {
class ArrayStack{
private char[] array; //æ ˆæ•°ç»„
private int n; //æ ˆä¸ªæ•°
private int stack_size; //æ ˆå¤§å°
//åˆå§‹åŒ–
public ArrayStack(int stack_size){
this.array = new char[stack_size];
this.n = 0;
this.stack_size = stack_size;
}
//å…¥æ ˆ
public boolean push(char item){
//å¦‚æœæ ˆæ»¡äº†
if(stack_size == n) return false;

array[n] = item;
n++;
return true;
}
//å‡ºæ ˆ
public char pop(){
//å¦‚æœæ ˆé‡Œé¢æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®
if(n == 0) return Character.MIN_VALUE;
char data = array[n - 1];
n--;
return data;
}
}
//åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ç»„ç¬¦å·
public boolean isGroup(ArrayStack arrayStack, boolean flag, String left) {
char f = arrayStack.pop();
boolean tmp = false;
if(left.equals(String.valueOf(f))) {
tmp = true;
}
flag = flag & tmp;
return flag;
}

public boolean isValid(String s) {
int len = s.length();
ArrayStack arrayStack = new ArrayStack(len);
boolean flag = true;

for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
char c = s.charAt(i);
//å¦‚æœç¢°åˆ°å·¦æ‹¬å·å°±å‹æ ˆ
if("{".equals(String.valueOf(c)) || "[".equals(String.valueOf(c)) || "(".equals(String.valueOf(c))) {
arrayStack.push(c);
}
//å¦‚æœç¢°åˆ°å³æ‹¬å·
if("}".equals(String.valueOf(c))) {
flag = isGroup(arrayStack,flag,"{");
}

if("]".equals(String.valueOf(c))) {
flag = isGroup(arrayStack,flag,"[");
}

if(")".equals(String.valueOf(c))) {
flag = isGroup(arrayStack,flag,"(");
}
}
//æ ˆé‡Œé¢è¿˜æœ‰æœªåŒ¹é…çš„å·¦æ‹¬å·
if(arrayStack.n > 0) {
return false;
}

return flag;
}
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

typedef struct node node_t;
struct node
{
int val;
node_t *next;
};

typedef struct stack
{
size_t size;
node_t *top;
}stack_t;
int push( node_t * new, stack_t * stack)
{
if ( !new || !stack )
return 0;
new->next = stack->top;
stack->top = new;
++stack->size;
return 1;
}
node_t * pop(stack_t * stack)
{
if ( !stack )
return NULL;
if ( !stack->top )
return NULL;
node_t * top = stack->top;
stack->top = top->next;
top->next = NULL;
--stack->size;
return top;
}

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
stack_t stack = {0,NULL};
int i;
for(i = 0; i < 32; i++)
{
node_t * new = (node_t *)malloc(sizeof(node_t));
if ( new )
{
new->val = i + 'a';
new->next = NULL;
push(new, &stack);
}
}
while( stack.top )
{
node_t * top = pop(&stack);
printf("top val is %c, stack size is %d\n", top->val, stack.size);
free(top);
}

func (this *LinkedListStack) Print() {
if this.IsEmpty() {
fmt.Println("empty stack")
} else {
for this.topNode != nil {
fmt.Println(this.topNode.val)
this.topNode = this.topNode.next
}
}
}

public class SinglyLinkedStack<V> {
private int count; // æ ˆä¸­å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°
private Node<V> bottom = null; // æ ˆåº•
private Node<V> top = null; // æ ˆé¡¶

private static class Node<V> {
V value;
Node<V> next;
public Node(V node) {
this.value = node;
this.next = null;
}
}

public boolean push(V value) {
if (bottom == null) {
this.bottom = new Node<>(value);
this.top = bottom;
} else {
Node<V> l = top;
Node<V> newNode = new Node<>(value);
this.top = newNode;
l.next = newNode;
}
count++;
return true;
}

public V pop() {
if (top == null) {
return null;
}
V value = top.value;
if (bottom == top) {
bottom.value = null;
bottom = null;
top.value = null;
top = null; // help gc
count--;
return value;
}
int pos = 1;
Node<V> n = bottom;
while (pos != (count - 1)) { // æŸ¥æ‰¾åˆ°å€’æ•°ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
pos++;
n = n.next;
}
top.value = null; // help gc
top.next = null;
n.next = null;
top = n;
count--;
return value;
}
}
